collection:
Collection of Your Personal Information NotoLab's action is designed to
provide a personalized and efficient experience.

The only personal information
we collect is: Conversation History: We store the conversation history to
improve the functionality and responsiveness of our action.

This includes the
text of your interactions with our action.

Use of Your Personal Information
The personal information we collect is used in the following ways: To Improve
Services: Your conversation history helps us to better understand your needs
and preferences, enabling us to enhance our action and tailor it more closely
to your interests.

Customer Support: To provide customer support and respond
to your inquiries effectively, we may use your conversation history to
understand your queries better.

Access to Your
Personal Information You have the right to access, correct, or delete your
personal information collected by our action.

We encourage you to periodically review this policy to stay informed
about how we are protecting the personal information we collect.
sharing:
Sharing of Your Personal Information NotoLab
will not share your personal information with third parties except as
described in this policy.

We may share your information with: Service
Providers: We may share your conversation history with service providers that
perform services on our behalf.

These service providers are bound by law or
contract to protect the personal information and are only allowed to use the
personal information in accordance with the terms of our service agreements
with them.

Legal Obligations: We may disclose your personal information if
required by law or if we believe in good faith that such action is necessary
to comply with a legal obligation, protect and defend our rights or property,
and act in urgent circumstances to protect the personal safety of users of our
services or the public.
